definition: Skilled; expert: an accomplished pianist. See Synonyms at proficient.
Having many social graces; polished or refined.
Unquestionable; indubitable: That smoking causes health problems is an accomplished fact.
Completed; effected; established; as, an accomplished fact
Complete in acquirements usually as a result of training; -- commonly in a good sense; as, an accomplished scholar, an accomplished villain
simple past tense and past participle of accomplish
First attested in the late 15th century.
